dcterms:description: A multi-agent reinforcement learning task where agents, represented as larval clams, learn to settle in nutrient-rich patches while avoiding competition for space.
dcterms:title: Clamity

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: An evaluation platform for general agents that includes various Atari games, notably used for benchmarking reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Atari game Montezuma’s Revenge

dcterms:creator: J. Z. Leibo
E. A. Dueñez-Guzmán
A. Vezhnevets
J. P. Agapiou
P. Sunehag
R. Koster
J. Matyas
C. Beattie
I. Mordatch
T. Graepel
dcterms:description: A scalable evaluation suite for multi-agent reinforcement learning that allows for the assessment of agents in various cooperative scenarios.
dcterms:title: Melting Pot evaluation suite

dcterms:creator: W. Banzhaf
L. Yamamoto
dcterms:description: A framework for simulating chemical processes and reactions, used to create environments for testing reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Simple Artificial Chemistry

dcterms:description: A task involving metabolic cycles that includes distractor molecules, designed to test agents' abilities to manage resources and rewards in a complex environment.
dcterms:title: Chemistry Metabolic Cycles with Distractors
